reviewText: I love my Karen mcdougal dvd very much everything is great. Very quick delivery. super seller would buy from again thanks A+++++

I had the Playboy issue with Karen as the Playmate of the Month. She was so gorgeous, that I bought this video. I enjoyed getting to know Karen better as well as seeing her amazing boobies in motion. I especially liked the scene where she was walking naked through downtown of her hometown. Karen is stunningly beautiful.

While I love this video and love Karen Mcdougal even more, I feel that the video could have been better.  While we do get to see numerous shots of her fantastically sculpted body, the shots are too quick.  I've heard the edits used described as MTV which makes sense because they're rather fast.  What happen to slow, long, full shots of her and her wonderful figure?  Some of the scenes in this video are really nice, one being the encounter in the hall, while others shouldn't have made the final cut.  All in all, this video is worth getting if you're a fan of Karen Mcdougal PMOY 1998.  Or just rent it.  I don't care.

Karen McDougal is the sexiest woman alive. The video is tame but Karen isn't. She smiles at you, you melt. She winks at you, you melt. Spend two hours with this video and wake up with a smile on your face.

Karen McDougal is quite the beauty alright.  She has an amazing high school queen face, and an amazing body that compliments it perfectly.  Unfortunately Playboy seemed to not focus on these strengths enough.  The  best scenes in this video are very short and don't give us much of a  glimpse of the fun Karen.  As a matter of fact, most scenes depict McDougal  in a way that she seems too fragile and that if someone touched her she'd  shatter into a million pieces.  As an arty video, this would be mediocre to  decent, but as a playboy video with the intent of displaying the playmate  in a sensual and real way, it falls quite short.
It also goes without  saying that it would appear that McDougal had a breast augmentation.  The  way that the video has that too fragile to touch look only seems to  emphasize this.
On a bright note, Nikki Schieler's Playmate profile is  much more entertaining than McDougal's despite my personal opinion that  Karen is more attractive and seductive than Schieler.

Karen Mcdougal is just gorgeous in this video.  The problem here is the way in which Playboy showcases this lovely lady's attributes; that is in an all too typical "make love to the camera MTV video fashion."
What I would love to see is a playmate in a more natural setting,  not  alone, but not making out with a chippendale's look alike.
 I would love  to see her getting naked and jumping into a public fountain as dazed  onlookers watch in amazement.  Playboy and voyeurism go hand in hand, and  it would be great if thier videos depicted more of it.  That is, if they  showed the playmates casually undressing in front of other people.
